parallel.distributed

Class DAccumulatorSrv

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DAccumulatorSrv

  • public class DAccumulatorSrv
extends java.lang.Object
    class implements a server for distributed data accumulation functionality. Multiple JVMs can send numerical data to this server, or ask for the min/max/sum/etc. value the server currently holds. Clients may also register to receive notifications from this server on a different port, which is useful because otherwise, to get informed of a new value found by another distributed process, a client would have to poll the server. Each client may as well be multi-threaded.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2016

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

    • Constructor Detail

      • DAccumulatorSrv

        DAccumulatorSrv(int port,
                int maxthreads,
                int notificationsport)
        constructor specifying the port the server will listen to, and the maximum number of threads in the thread-pool.
        Parameters:
        port - int if < 1024, the number 7900 is used.
        maxthreads - int if < 10000, the number 9999 is used.
        notificationsport - int if < 1024, the number 9900 is used.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run()
  throws java.io.IOException,
         ParallelException
        enters an infinite loop, listening for socket connections, and handling the incoming sockets as new Runnable tasks (DAccTask objects) that are given to the associated thread-pool.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        ParallelException

      • addArgDblPair

        void addArgDblPair(java.io.Serializable arg,
                   double val)
        updates the server statistics according to the (arg,val) pair in the parameters. Notice that this method is synchronized but theoretically it could synchronize on a different object since the methods that simply add numbers to the accumulator do not interfere with the (arg,value) pair methods.
        Parameters:
        arg - Serializable
        val - double
